Class Board

java.lang.Object
model.Board

public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Stores information about the game board

      public Cell[][] getBoard()
      Gets the board as matrix
      Returns:

    • getCell

      public Cell getCell​(int row, int column)
      Gets a specified Cell
      Parameters:
      row - The row number
      column - The column number
      Returns:
      The cell placed in specified coordinates or null value if row and column are not valid

    • getAdjacents

      public java.util.List<Cell> getAdjacents​(Cell cell)
      Gets all the cells that are adjacent to a specified cell
      Parameters:
      cell - A cell of the board
      Returns:
      A list of the adjacent cells

    • getNextCell

      public Cell getNextCell​(Cell cell, Direction direction)
      Gets the cell obtained by moving from one cell in one direction
      Parameters:
      cell - The starting cell
      direction - The direction of the movement
      Returns:
      The next cell

    • getPrevCell

      public Cell getPrevCell​(Cell currentCell, Direction previouslyDirection)
      Gets the cell from which you moved to reach the current cell
      Parameters:
      currentCell - The current cell
      previouslyDirection - The direction of the movement
      Returns:
      The cell from which you moved or null value
